data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Tosu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Gamba to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 4, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Tosu's Yuta Higuchi breaks free at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Tosu apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Cho Dong-geon. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in Tosu.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 13, Gamba's Hiroki Fujiharu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu push forward at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium and Ryang Yong-Gi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gamba defence.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 19, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 20, Free kick Tosu.
Kazuma Watanabe is on target to give Gamba a 0-1 advantage.
Hiroki Fujiharu instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Gamba.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
In the minute 26, In Tosu, Gamba push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Gamba throw-in in Tosu's half.
In the minute 30, In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Kazuma Watanabe puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Ademilson.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 42, Hiroki Fujiharu for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Tosu are pushing forward but Cho Dong-geon's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 43, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Gamba a goal kick.
Gamba have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Tosu.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tosu close to the penalty box.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Tosu.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Hiroki Fujiharu with Kosuke Onose. This is the first substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
The away team replace Shu Kurata with Shuhei Kawasaki.
In the minute 46, Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a first substitution, with Kaisei Ishii replacing Takeshi Kanamori.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 49, Tosu needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tosu's half?
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 50, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Tosu throw-in in Gamba's half.
Goal kick for Gamba at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Shuhei Kawasaki (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba advance rapidly upfield but Akihiko Ikeuchi blows for offside.
Tosu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 55, Gamba to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Tosu's area.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 59, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Tosu are coming forward and Yuto Uchida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gamba at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 64, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Renzo Lopez is replacing Cho Dong-geon for the home team.
Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's third substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Ayumu Ohata replacing Daiki Matsuoka.
In the minute 65, Takashi Usami is replacing Ademilson for Gamba at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu have a dangerous throw-in.
In Tosu Tosu attack through Kaisei Ishii. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Ryoya Morishita of Tosu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 70, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Gamba a goal kick.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's fourth substitution at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium with Yuki Yamamoto replacing Shinya Yajima.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 72, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 74, Ryu Takao (Gamba) has received a yellow card from Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Tosu's Teruki Hara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tosu are pushing forward but Renzo Lopez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Gamba at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu make their fourth substitution with Daichi Hayashi replacing Tomoya Koyamatsu.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 79, Renzo Lopez (Tosu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Patric is on a sub for Kazuma Watanabe for Gamba.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Tosu.
At Ekimae Real Estate Stadium, Tosu are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 84, Gamba to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Ryang Yong-Gi with Yoshiki Takahashi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Tosu.
In the minute 86, Gamba are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Gamba push upfield but Akihiko Ikeuchi quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Akihiko Ikeuchi will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Throw-in Tosu.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Tosu. The final score is 1-2.
Renzo Lopez (Tosu) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
Great play from Riki Harakawa to set up the goal.
